00021    /*
00022    * This function exists to guarantee initialization of static constants.
00023    * Calling it guarantees that the contents of this file will be linked,
00024    * rather than optimized away. It may only be called once.
00025    */
00026    void Constants::initStatic() 
00027    {
00028       // This method may only be called once.
00029       static int nCall = 0;
00030       ++nCall;
00031    }

00033 }
